title: Airtel Lanka’s investments in enhanced service and value recognised at NBEA 2021
body_lines: Sri Lanka’s most preferred telco among youth, Airtel Lanka once again won recognition at the National Business Excellence Awards (NBEA).

Organized by the National Chamber of Commerce of Sri Lanka (NCCSL), Airtel was presented with the Merit award in the ‘Other Services/Other Sectors’ category. The award was in recognition of the telco’s continuous investments towards enhancing digital connectivity across the nation, while creating innovative and a rewarding customer experiences.

Commenting on the win, Airtel Lanka CEO and Managing Director, Ashish Chandra said, “It is an honour to be recognized among such a distinguished group of enterprises. The past year has been a lesson in the value of delivering excellence in all facets of business. While we are witnessing challenging times, we continue to believe in Sri Lanka’s potential and we look forward to creating value that positively impacts the nation’s economic progress.”

Notably Airtel has also previously been recognized in the same category in 2019.  The NBEA is one of Sri Lanka’s pioneering award competitions initiated by The National Chamber of Commerce of Sri Lanka. It has maintained a strong reputation as the premier national platform which recognizes the best of the best businesses in corporate excellence in Sri Lanka.
